dashboard.description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/1144116676 at Wed Mar 31 17:26:43 UTC 2021

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: SLIs Apdex

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: SLIs Error Ratio

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: SLIs RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:

panels.title: Extra links

panels.description: Average amount of SQL queries performed by a controller action.
panels.title: WEB SQL Queries per Action

panels.description: Average sum of all SQL query latency accumulated by a controller action.

targets.expr:
avg_over_time(
  controller_action:gitlab_sql_duration_seconds_sum:rate1m{
    environment="$environment",
    stage='$stage',
    action=~"$action",
    controller=~"$controller",
    feature_category=~'(code_quality|code_testing|load_testing|browser_performance|usability_testing|accessibility_testing)',
    type='web'
  }[$__interval]
)
/
avg_over_time(
  controller_action:gitlab_transaction_duration_seconds_count:rate1m{
    environment="$environment",
    stage='$stage',
    action=~"$action",
    controller=~"$controller",
    feature_category=~'(code_quality|code_testing|load_testing|browser_performance|usability_testing|accessibility_testing)',
    type='web'
  }[$__interval]
)

panels.title: WEB SQL Latency per Action

panels.description: Average latency of individual SQL queries
panels.title: WEB SQL Latency per Query

panels.description: Average total number of caching operations (Read & Write) per action.
panels.title: WEB Caches per Action

panels.description: The rate (Jobs per Second) at which jobs are completed after dequeue
panels.title: Sidekiq Completion Rate

panels.description: The rate (Jobs per Second) at which jobs fail after dequeue
panels.title: Sidekiq Error Rate
